    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleEnterpriseCreated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode enterpriseData)
    Handels a "group_created" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an EnterpriseEventDto and transformed in a Enterprise entity.
    void handleEnterpriseDeleted​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode enterpriseData)
    Handels a "group_deleted" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an EnterpriseIdEventDto.

    Updates an existing enterprise.

    Handels a "user_created" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserEventDto and transformed in a User entity.

    Handels a "user_deleted" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserIdEventDto.
    java.lang.Boolean handleUserDepartmentUpdated​(java.util.UUID userId, DepartmentDto department)
    Assigns an existing user a new department.
    void handleUserUpdated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userData)
    Handels a "user_updated" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserDetailEventDto and transformed in a User entity.

  • Method Details

    • handleEnterpriseCreated

      public void handleEnterpriseCreated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode enterpriseData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Description copied from interface: IEnterpriseCommandService
      Handels a "group_created" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an EnterpriseEventDto and transformed in a Enterprise entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Specified by:
      handleEnterpriseCreated in interface IEnterpriseCommandService
      Parameters:
      enterpriseData - the event enterprise data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the enterpriseData cannot be converted to a EnterpriseEventDto.

    • handleEnterpriseUpdated

      public java.lang.Boolean handleEnterpriseUpdated​(java.lang.String enterpriseName, EnterpriseUpdateDto enterprise)
      Description copied from interface: IEnterpriseCommandService
      Updates an existing enterprise.
      Specified by:
      handleEnterpriseUpdated in interface IEnterpriseCommandService
      Parameters:
      enterpriseName - the enterprise name
      enterprise - the enterprise data
      Returns:
      True, if the enterprise exists and was updated successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • handleEnterpriseDeleted

      public void handleEnterpriseDeleted​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode enterpriseData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Description copied from interface: IEnterpriseCommandService
      Handels a "group_deleted" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an EnterpriseIdEventDto. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.

      Parameters:
      enterpriseData - the event enterpriseData data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the enterpriseData cannot be converted to a EnterpriseIdEventDto.
